Instrument.name: Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter Mars Color Imager
Instrument.description: The Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter (MRO) Mars Color Imager (MARCI) was designed to monitor the martian atmosphere to characterize variations in Mars' weather and climate on daily, seasonal, and longer-terms. It was also designed to detect variations in ozone, dust, and carbon dioxide, observe dust storms, and monitor changes in the polar caps. MARCI provides images in five visible and two ultraviolet bands.
